settings.info: Will be scaled down to 152px x 152px

settings.info: Only applicable for header layout style-1

settings.info: Create page and select template page.wishlist

settings.label: Variant option default style
settings.info: Value of 'variant option default style' will be used for option not matching with below 5 options.

settings.label: Add variant title to show as color swatches
settings.info: Example: Color, couleur, Farbe, Kleur, Farge

settings.label: Add variant title to show as size swatches
Show variant option
settings.info: Product card have limit to show only one option.

settings.label: Number of variant options to show
Sale label display type
settings.info: For variant product, it will display text only.

settings.label: Enter goal amount in base currency
settings.info: You need to set up a free shipping rates at 'Admin > Settings > Shipping and delivery' based on the order value as per the goal amount entered above.

settings.label: Display message until goal reached
settings.info: {{amount}} is left amount to reach the goal.

settings.label: Display message after goal reached
settings.default: Congrats! You are eligible for FREE Shipping

settings.label: Checkbox label
settings.default: Gift wrap your purchase for just {price}

settings.label: Transition speed
settings.info: Enter slide speed time like 500, where 1000 = 1 second

settings.label: Auto speed delay
settings.info: Enter delay time (before switching to other slide) like 500, where 1000 = 1 second

settings.label: Cookie description
settings.default: This website uses cookie to ensure you to get the best experience on our website
